name: Bluey's Adventure
description:
Door and Spikes were made by myself using the pixelated art making program or desktop app Piskel.com

Grassland, DungeonArea, WinTheme, and LoseTheme were made by myself using https://deepnight.net/tools/rpg-map/ and afterwards using Unity to edit out the stages.

Blue Cap Character was designed by Curt from https://opengameart.org/content/rpg-character

Font Style: https://www.1001freefonts.com/bitmap-pixel-fonts.php

Background Music: 

Game Over: https://www.zapsplat.com/?s=8+bit+game+over&post_type=music&sound-effect-categor...

Win: https://www.zapsplat.com/?s=8+bit+win&post_type=music&sound-effect-category-id=
